name: Daemon
description:
The Daemons are purely digital entities, bound by forbidden processes to administer machine-fortresses in the upper void.
But there are a few among the Daemons who've had their forms twisted for the sake of an experiment - an emergency protocol, never designed to be used, but forced upon an unlucky few. These Daemons have had their machine-spirits forcibly downloaded into corporeal bodies, cursing them with form.
Though their flesh is weak, the Daemon's machine-like mind ignores many ills that plague fully organic beings. Embedded programs enable several minor abilities.
